tag_line: ARE YOU THINKING, WHAT WE ARE THINKING?

rules.info: Each speaker will be given a topic related to I.T or Current Affairs (His/Her choice)
Speaker  will be given 1 minute and 30 seconds to speak on that topic.
Time allotted for each speaker may be increased or be cut down depending upon the number of participants.
6 speakers will be selected for the final round.
These  6 speakers must form a team of two for the final round.
The selected speaker can select anyone from his/her college team who registered for Gateways.
Rules of the final round will be explained on the day of the event.
Topic of debate of the final round will be given on Day 1.
